<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of our <S%H572>sacks<s%> we have <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to you from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> then could we <S%H1589>steal<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> from your lord's <S%H1004>house<s%>?

and the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from me, and I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>"Surely<s%> he is <S%H2963>torn<s%> in <S%H2963>pieces,<s%>" and I have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> him <S%H5704>since.<s%> <S%H2008><s%>
